Board of Adjustments
====================

Meetings
--------

* 7:30 pm
* 2nd Thursday of every month (as needed)

Agendas & Minutes
-----------------

Agendas are available prior to the meetings. Minutes are available following approval.

[View Most Recent Agendas and Minutes](https://www.pvtx.gov/AgendaCenter/Board-of-Adjustments-2)

Members
-------

* Rebekah Corder
* Kassandra Gaither

* Steven Nelson
* Alternates:
  + C.B. Bell
  + Cynthia Conrad
  + Amanda Rodriguez
  + Vacant (1)
